528 yds c3 blueprint c8 medallion c4 cosmos c9 seafoam c5 plinth © seth richardson 2020 sethrichardsonknits@gmail com instagram @sethnrichardson cast on edge camp©fi rseet hb rliachnarkdseotn v 2 102 10 0 s5e/th2r3ic h ©ard sseonthkn ritsic@hgamrdaisl oconm 2 0 in2s0ta-2gr0a2m3 @ sethnrichardson page 5 wet blocking large pieces wet blocking is my preferred way to finish my large piece i follow the standard wet blocking knit pieces not only does it help even out your instructions above but i soak the piece in a stitches but it gives you a sense of how your bathtub when the soaking is finished i allow fabric will behave whenever you have to give it
